title: Needs and Wants
description: What do we want? What do we really need? Students will learn the difference between requirements and desires in this helpful leveled reader. The text uses familiar situations that students easily connect to, and the illustrations cleverly show how we often wish for what we want even as we get what we need.
meta: breathe, clothing, lemonade, pasta, storm, winter
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Classify Information : Classify and categorize text information
Final Blends : Identify final n-blends nd, nk, ng, and nt
Consonant Blends : Associate the letters nd, nk, ng, and nt with the phonetic elements /nd/, /nk/, /ng/, and /nt/
Adjectives : Recognize adjectives as words that describe

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
